casebody.data:
Thursday, September 14, 1995

MERIT DOCKET

95-222. Allstate Ins. Co. v. Cutcher.

Certified Question of State Law, No. 3-93-CV-7721. On preliminary memoranda pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XVIII(6). The court declines to answer the certified questions. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Cook, JJ., concur. Douglas and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent and would answer both questions.
